Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2

Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes

package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint
     
    ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.commandMenuBar
     
    ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.controlPanels
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Circle
    A class representing a circle on the canvas.
    Highlighter
    A class representing a highlighter tool used for drawing translucent squiggles on the canvas.
    Oval
    The Oval class represents an oval shape that can be drawn, filled, and interacted with on the canvas.
    Point
    The Point class represents a 2D point with x and y coordinates.
    Polygon
    The Polygon class represents a polygon shape with a specified number of vertices, a stroke thickness, and fill properties.
    Polyline
    The Polyline class represents a polyline shape, which is a series of connected points that form a continuous line.
    PrecisionEraser
    The PrecisionEraser class represents a special type of squiggle used as an eraser tool for precise drawing.
    Rectangle
    A class representing a rectangle on the canvas.
    Shape
    Abstract base class representing a shape instance on the canvas.
    SmartShape
    SmartShape extends the Squiggle class to provide functionality for creating shapes that can be finalized into closed polygons based on certain conditions, such as proximity of points and angular tolerance.
    Square
    The Square class represents a square shape, a special case of a polygon.
    Squiggle
    This class represents a squiggle on the canvas, which is an ordered set of points connected to each by a line.
    Text
    This class represents a Text shape that can be added to the canvas.
    Triangle
    Represents a triangle shape on the canvas.
